SELECT * FROM (SELECT board_id, member_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_nickname, board_hit, board_like, board_comment_count, bgroup_id, scrap_count,
searchcount,
rownum r FROM (SELECT b.*, count(a.scrap_id) as scrap_count FROM (SELECT board_id, member_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_nickname, board_hit, board_like, board_comment_count, bgroup_id
,(
(SUM(NVL((length(BOARD_TITLE) - length(replace(UPPER(BOARD_TITLE),UPPER(#{search}),''))) ,1) +NVL((length(BOARD_CONTENT) - length(replace(UPPER(BOARD_CONTENT),UPPER(#{search}),''))) ,1) +NVL((length(BOARD_NICKNAME) - length(replace(UPPER(BOARD_NICKNAME),UPPER(#{search}),''))) ,1)))
)as searchcount
FROM board GROUP BY board_id, member_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_nickname, board_comment_count, board_hit, board_like, board_comment_count, bgroup_id) b LEFT OUTER JOIN scrap a ON a.board_id = b.board_id GROUP BY b.board_id, b.member_id, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_date, b.board_nickname, b.board_hit, b.board_like, b.board_comment_count, b.bgroup_id
, searchcount
ORDER BY
searchcount DESC,
${category} DESC) WHERE rownum <= #{endrow}) WHERE
searchcount != 0 AND
r >= #{startrow}

SELECT COUNT(board_id) FROM (SELECT board_id
,(
(SUM(NVL((length(BOARD_TITLE) - length(replace(UPPER(BOARD_TITLE),UPPER(#{search}),''))) ,1) +NVL((length(BOARD_CONTENT) - length(replace(UPPER(BOARD_CONTENT),UPPER(#{search}),''))) ,1) +NVL((length(BOARD_NICKNAME) - length(replace(UPPER(BOARD_NICKNAME),UPPER(#{search}),''))) ,1)))
)as searchcount
FROM board GROUP BY board_id)
WHERE searchcount != 0

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.board_id, count(b.scrap_id) scrap_count FROM (select board_id from board) a LEFT OUTER JOIN SCRAP b ON a.board_id = b.board_id GROUP BY a.board_id) c LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD d ON c.board_id = d.board_id WHERE board_tag LIKE #{tag} OR board_tag LIKE #{tag2}||'%' OR board_tag LIKE '%'||#{tag3} OR board_tag LIKE '%'||#{tag4}||'%'
ORDER BY d.board_like DESC, d.board_comment_count DESC, c.scrap_count DESC, d.board_hit DESC, d.board_id DESC
ORDER BY d.board_id DESC
